data.message: I am sending YelaWolf to everyone!   Props to you for finding, finally!, someone, something, new!   So, I send you ME, on twitter, but I'm just me fooling around....he's amazing...and I AM A SLUMAMERICAN!  I will pr your man everywhere..and I'm trying to hire him for an event for my blog failingfifty.com...i'm from poverty....but i rose up by work and smarts and I can't afford him but I'm working it....I'm going to find a way...watch me Marshall.....watch this 57yr old woman RISE cuz I live by music...I AM MICHAEL JACKSON'S sister by another by mother (not nearly the same talent, but I live solely and only through music & by my kids)
